item.description: Rather than the usual buffet brunch, this month we?re going to head to the East Windsor Restaurant on Route 5 ? take Exit 44 off from I-91 and head south on Route 5, the restaurant is on the left. We?ll meet at noon and order from their 24-hour-diner menu so you can have lunch or breakfast, your choice! One member described the East Windsor Restaurant as a "diner on steroids," so you diner afficionados should be sure to join us.
item.name: Fourth Sunday Brunch
